title: Fatal hunting accident occurs in Frederick County, Md.
content:
FREDERICK COUNTY, Md. (ABC7) — One person is dead after a rifle accidentally discharged in Frederick County, Maryland on Saturday.
Maryland Natural Resources Police got word of the accidental shooting at around 9:43 a.m. Police say a 32-year-old California man was visiting family in the area and went hunting near 6600 Eylers Valley Flint Road.
Preliminary investigation shows that Vincent Cavallo, of Alta Dena slipped and fell and the gun discharged and hit him in the face.
